title: Clan
body: Salve a tutti, cerco clan e amici x fare partite e crescere , sono liv 30 ,ho la nuova app del gioco x chattare ,cercatemi nel game.

replies.body:
Hi!
I am from a gaming community and we are always looking for new members for competitive play, clash rosters or for casual play. We are a Multi Gaming community called Damage Inc with 1200+ 
active members and we are sponsored by Twitch. 
Please read the following document if you’re interested (its not too long): https://docs.google.com/document/d/137VWSnCyJMwPG1Mw62C55A8nn3tybhQbttHL1E7yDY0/edit?usp=sharing
Be sure to ask any questions you have!
Si ma scrivi per bene, ma ti costa tanto scrivere per?
Scusa non sapevo sapevo che poteva ferire qualcuno :)
